tnc.text: All OB members are entitled to participate and play in this Mini Game. Promotion period starts from 21st Dec 2022 12:00:00 (GMT+8) until 2nd Jan 2023 23:59:59 (GMT+8).
tnc.text1: To redeem the mini game ticket, members are required to make a single minimum deposit of MYR100 to get 1 ticket.
tnc.text21: In order to claim these Mini Games tickets, the deposit amount must be a single minimum of MYR100 or above. Members are allowed to obtain a maximum of five (5) Mini Game Tickets per day.
tnc.text22: Once you have redeemed the Mini games tickets, you can click spin and claim the Cash Prizes. All prizes will be credited to the players account automatically within 60 seconds.
tnc.text23: You are required to meet x1 turnover before withdrawal can be made. (Total turnover 1 times of the bonus)
tnc.text233: Required Bet Amount = MYR999 x 1 = MYR999
tnc.text24: The Mini Game ticket is only available from 21st Dec 2022 12:00:00 (GMT+8) until 2nd Jan 2023 23:59:59 (GMT+8) and will expire on 3rd Jan 2023 00:00:00 (GMT+8)
tnc.text25: Members must use all tickets before the expiration date
tnc.text26: This promotion cannot be used in conjunction with other OB promotions.
tnc.text27: OB reserves the right to modify, cancel, suspend or terminate the promotion and/or change the terms of the said promotion at any time without prior notice.
tnc.text28: Participating members must accept and comply with all the terms mentioned above as well as all relevant rules and regulations stated on the OB website.
